167a2('bum): pa'i 'du shes can la bsrabs pa'i sa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes can la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes can la byas pa rtogs pa'is myed do// dngos po myed
167a3('bum): pa'i 'du shes can la rang sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes can la byang chub sems dpa'i sa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi sa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i
167a4('bum): 'du shes can la lam bsgom pa gang la brten cing nyon mongs dpa gang gis bsgribs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par chud par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smyon
167a5('bum): myed par ma chud pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid da thob par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma thob pas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
167a6('bum): mongs pa thams cad myi spongs pa'i sgrib pa nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i lam myed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
167a7('bum): 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po mchis par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po ma mchis par 'du shes pa mchis
167a8('bum): sam gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du shes su 'du shes dang / 'du byed du 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang // myig tu 'du shes pa dang
167b1('bum): na bar 'du shes pa dang / sngar 'du shes pa dang / ser 'du shes pa dang / lus su 'du shes pa dang / yid du 'du shes pa dang // gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / slar 'du shes pa dang / drir 'du shes pa
167b2('bum): dang / ror 'du shes pa dang / reg tu dushe pa dang / chos su 'du shes pa dang // myig gi rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes par 'du
167b3('bum): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /
167b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa/ dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
167b5('bum): te reg par 'du shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
167b6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
167b7('bum): rkyend kyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang // sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / chu'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / mye'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / rlung gi khams su 'du shes pa dang / nam mkha
167b8('bum): khams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang // 'dod chags su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod chags spang bar 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang
168a1('bum): spang bar 'du shes pa dang / gti mug du 'du shes pa dang / gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ma rig par 'du shes pa dang / ma rig pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed du 'du shes/
168a2('bum): pa dang / 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rna bar shes par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa rna bar 'du shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes
168a3('bum): pa dang / skye mched drug du 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / reg par 'du shes pa dang / reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba spang bar 'du shes
168a4('bum): pa dang / sred par 'du shes pa dang / sred pa spang bar 'du she sa pa dang / le nad par 'du shes pa dang / lend pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / srid par 'du shes pa dang / srid
168a5('bum): ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / skye bar 'du shes pa dang / skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rga shir 'du shes pa dang / shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang // mya ngan dang / smre sngags
168a6('bum): 'don par 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang / kun 'byung bar 'du shes
168a7('bum): pa dang / kun 'byung ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'gog par 'du shes pa dang / 'gog pa mngon tu bya bar 'du shes pa dang / lam du 'du shes pa dang / lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang
168a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'du shes pa 'am/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
168b1('bum): stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da de ni myed do// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la yang dngos po yod par 'du shes
168b2('bum): pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed do// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed pa de nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'thun
168b3('bum): ba'i bzod pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par 'du shes pa myed pa de nyid ni/ lam bsgom pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed par/
168b4('bum): 'du shes pa myed pa de nyid ni 'bras bu'o// rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dang sa po myed pa ste/ mngon par rtogs pa yang dngos po myed
168b5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar rnam grangs des kyang / 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
168b6('bum): de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
168b7('bum): sangs rgyas par gyur te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba'i yul la/ mnga' brnyes par gyur de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das/
168b8('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor da 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing / pha rold tu phyind pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben
169a1('bum): sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
169a2('bum): rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dag ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa'i myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind las skyes pa/ dga' ba dang bde
169a3('bum): pa can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong zhing 'phags
169a4('bum): pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so//
169a5('bum): bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing snga ma'i yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms
169a6('bum): dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyurd te 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang / bsam gtan gi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ bas
169a7('bum): gtan de dag gis bsnyems par ma gyur da/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyurd/ bsam gtan du dmyigs pa'i ma gyur te/ de ltar na/ ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la
169a8('bum): mnyam par bzhag go// de ltar ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam par smind par byas nas/ shes pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya lha'i rna ba'i shes pa mngon tu bya
169b1('bum): ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol kyi sems shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i
169b2('bum): myig gi shes pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ 'on kyang nga mngon par shes pa mngon tu bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur ro myong ba
169b3('bum): ma gyurd/ dmyigs par ma gyur te mngon par shes pa lnga po de dag nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas/ mnyam par gzhag ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis
169b4('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog
169b5('bum): pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes paragyur te/ de ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
169b6('bum): ldan par gyur pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyurapa/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan par gyur da/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyurapa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur
169b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/ sems can rnams phung po gsum du srung bsta nad par gyur to// rab 'byor kyis gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das
169b8('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyurd/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo
170a1('bum): nyid kyi drug mngon par mkhyend pa bskyed par gyurapa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyurd/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i
170a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi myi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par gyur da/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur da/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi byams pa
170a3('bum): chen po bskyed par gyur pa/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur da/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par
170a4('bum): gyurd/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis pa ra ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstand par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ rab 'byor da gal te
170a5('bum): 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dang / sa po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor da ngas sngon byang chub
170a6('bum): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to mya dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te
170a7('bum): gnas par yang myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor da 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to myi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du nal dngos po
170a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rab 'byor da de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas
170b1('bum): pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyurd to// rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su

170b3('bum): dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang ba snyoms la gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong ba la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod

170b5('bum): shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas nub pas bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar
170b6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// rab 'byor dgal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor da ngas kyang
170b7('bum): mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par myi gyur te/ rab 'byor de 'di ltar
170b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po myed de ngo bo nyid myed pa gzhan gi dngos po myed pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa la
171a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chud de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
171a2('bum): par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byord kyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la
171a3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du chos thams cad dngos
171a4('bum): po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyod pa dang / mthard kyi sa bslob pa dang / mthar da kyis nan tan du bgyi ba ga
171a5('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar da kyis spyod pa dang / mthar kyis slob pa dang / mthard kyis nan tan
171a6('bum): du bgyi ba mchis par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor da 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang
171a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkra pa'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / b+hir mi 'ong ba dang / san cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa da
171a8('bum): las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dngos
171b1('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang
171b2('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'phags pa la thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo nyid chung ngu ma sA'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas tsam yang myed do/
171b3('bum): zhes bya bar thos na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ji ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
171b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa rnams kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid phyir myi 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po myed
171b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang / dngos po mye/ da pa'i ngo bo nyid rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams kyang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gal te bdag bla na myed pa
171b6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po myed pa nyid yin gyis
171b7('bum): ci nas kyang bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po myed pa la rab
171b8('bum): tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlo ba'i phyir/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
172a1('bum): tu mngon par 'jug ste/ mthar kyis smad pa dang / mthar kyis smad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslab shing sngon gyi byang chub sems
172a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar da kyis spyod pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang /
172a3('bum): mthard kyis nan tan du rtsom mo// de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
172a4('bum): phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyin/ pa drug la spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
172a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su
172a6('bum): gtong ba de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing / 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par gyur da te skyon dang / ser sA myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba
172a7('bum): dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de/ zas 'dod pa la ni zas skom 'dod pa la ni skom/ gzhon pa 'dod pa la ni gzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa la ni gos spos 'dod pa la ni spos/ 'phreng
172a8('bum): ba 'dod pa la ni 'phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa la ni byug pa/ mal tsa 'dod pa la ni mal tsa/ gnas 'dod pa la ni gnas/ mar me 'dod pa la ni mar me/ nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye du rgya dang
172b1('bum): rlung dang / man shes dang / byi mu dang / gser dang / dngus 'dod pa rnams la ni nom bu dang / mu tig dang / bye ru kra dang / rlung dang / man shes dang / rtse chu dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su gtong ba nas
172b2('bum): skyil yo byad gang ci yang rung ba dag kyang / de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/ de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do/
172b3('bum): mye'o che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis shes rab kyi phrang
172b4('bum): po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge la nin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol pa'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de stod pa dang
172b5('bum): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba des/ rnam par gros pa'i ye shes mtho ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang
172b6('bum): rgyal khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / num par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas mas

172b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ rgya ma sa sa kyi pa gas/ sems cad rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub
173a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar da kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do//
173a2('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gzhan yang tshul
173a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs
173a4('bum): pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshul khrim sa des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// mye'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de nor myed pa'i sems
173a5('bum): can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzind la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do//
173a6('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par
173a7('bum): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang
173a8('bum): rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas
173b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyind par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas
173b2('bum): chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na
173b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// /
173b4('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do//
173b5('bum): gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par sprul lo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i legs pa brjod do// gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
173b6('bum): spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul
173b7('bum): khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzind la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'dod na
173b8('bum): rnam par gral ba'i ya shas mthang ba la rab tu 'gad dang / de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol
174a1('bum): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam
174a2('bum): par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas
174a3('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas/ chos
174a4('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ se mas can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor/ ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor da de
174a5('bum): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar da kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang pa dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
174a6('bum): ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson
174a7('bum): 'grus rtsom mo// gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi yang legs pa brjod cing 'thun
174a8('bum): bas dka' bar spyod do// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la/
174b1('bum): lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor pa las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor da de ltar na/ byang chub seMs
174b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar da spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang
174b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim
174b4('bum): byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzi nad la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba
174b5('bum): ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pas
174b6('bum): sgrub bo/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go/ shes rab sgom mo// gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go/ tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go/ bzod
174b7('bum): pa la rab tu gzhog go/ brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go/ ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go// shes rab la rab tu gzhog go/ sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// tshul khrims kyi legs
174b8('bum): pa brjod do// bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do// bsam gtan gyi legs pa brjod do// shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do// gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs
176a1('bum): gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab bsgom pa de dag gi yang legs/
176a2('bum): pa brjod cing 'thun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
176a3('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de dang / thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub seMs
176a4('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyo na myed par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su da dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas
176a5('bum): nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed/ do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas
176a6('bum): sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthard
176a7('bum): kyis spyod pa com ste/ thams cad kyang dmyigs su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la rol nyid myed do//
176b1('bum): rnam par grol ba'i phung por yid la myi byed/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs par yid la myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la
176b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// ting nge 'dzind kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid byed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang
176b3('bum): la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i
176b4('bum): phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni/ dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa
176b5('bum): myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran ba'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom
176b6('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la myi byed/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la myi byed/ so so yang
176b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhis yid la kyi byed/ byams pa chen blos yid la myi byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yid la myi byed de/
176b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la jo bo nyid khyed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid kyi/
178a1('bum): gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// byams
178a2('bum): pa chen po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi
178a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni/ dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
178a4('bum): dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ sangs rgyas tes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor dade gzhan yang byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
178a5('bum): sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtend cing 'brel para'abyung bar yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
178a6('bum): 'di ltar rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni/ dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa
178a7('bum): myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha
178a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de ltar na/ mthard kyis spyod pa dang / mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa
178b1('bum): yin te/ de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa smos/
178b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol
178b3('bum): tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
178b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
178b5('bum): do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
178b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshukyi phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
178b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa
178b8('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
179a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
179a2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par/
179a3('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
179a4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dam po myed pa stong
179a5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid so ngas su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
179a6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
179a7('bum): pa'i ngobo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chu yub byin sarnapa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
179a8('bum): byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
179b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi nus kyis byang chub kyi stan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i za ba nyid kyi tshus kyis 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ngos/
179b2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs
179b3('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yos
179b4('bum): thogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul kyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar dkyis
179b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs
179b6('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mnam myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge
179b7('bum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin
179b8('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
180a1('bum): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so//
180a2('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying
180a3('bum): chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
180a4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
180a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod sa su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
180a6('bum): gyur da te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos rab
180a7('bum): 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas
180a8('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi ro la tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas/
180b1('bum): nas/ chos rjes su dran pa sgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid la myi byed/ myi dge ba'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la myi byed
180b2('bum): zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'phags pa'i ma yin pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa dang
180b3('bum): bcas pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zag pa myed pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed
180b4('bum): gzugs myed pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ 'dus byas kyi chos yod la myi byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
180b5('bum): de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nya da pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/
180b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni chos rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la
180b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor da de la na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang mthar kyis
180b8('bum): bslab pa dang / mthar da kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthard kyis spyod pa la slob cing / mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis
181a1('bum): 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po'i myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
181a2('bum): gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
181a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
181a4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ da do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong
181a5('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'ango bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ra byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang
181a6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid
181a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs
181a8('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
181b1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa
181b2('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong
181b3('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa
181b4('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod/ sa su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
181b5('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
181b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs
181b7('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs
181b8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs
182a1('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
182a2('bum): ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su
182a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tha radapa
182a4('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo/ nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
182a5('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
182a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
182a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
182a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
182b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
182b2('bum): kyi tshul gyis snying chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
182b3('bum): tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
182b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzo gas par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par
182b5('bum): 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta cig smos// rab 'byor da ji ltar na
182b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
182b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ dge 'dun
182b8('bum): rjes su dran bsgom ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs
183a1('bum): pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang / skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo
183a2('bum): nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni/ dngos po myed pa la dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ dge 'dun rjes
183a3('bum): su dran pa'o// rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ dge 'dun rjes su
183a4('bum): dran pa sgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar da kyis bslab pa yod pa yin
183a5('bum): mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthard kyis spyod pa la slob cing / mtha rad kyis bslab pa dang / mthard
183a6('bum): kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi
183a7('bum): phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson
183a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
183b1('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
183b2('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa
183b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
183b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/ ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma
183b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed
183b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
183b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
183b8('bum): do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
184a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dam po skyed pa 'dzub nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po snyed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngobo nyid kyi rgyal kyis ngo ba nyid stong ba nyid/
184a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyal gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngobo nyid kyi rgyal gyis dran pa
184a3('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
184a4('bum): gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya/ da do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
184a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
184a6('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par
184a7('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
184a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su
184b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngom po myed pa'i ra bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngom po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi thugs kyil 'dzin du som/
184b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ti
184b3('bum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngoms po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams
184b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byad do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin
184b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// da sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi ngas su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
184b6('bum): tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
184b7('bum): gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
184b8('bum): tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
185a1('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la
185a2('bum): dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byord
185a3('bum): ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa
185a4('bum): nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po
185a5('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing ma ral pa ma zhig pa ma 'dres pa skyon myed pa ma nyams pa mthu dang ldan pa/ mkhas pa
185a6('bum): bsngags pa shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzind yongs su bsgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te/ de tshul khrims de dngos po myed la ba'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
185a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid myed de/ kAng la ngo bo nyid myed pa'i de ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa la dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa
185a8('bum): myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi
185b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pas/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar
185b2('bum): kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis slob pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar dkyis bslab pa dang / mthar/
185b3('bum): kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims
185b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol// tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
185b5('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind
185b6('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
185b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
185b8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
186a1('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
186a2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su
186a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
186a4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyi sa rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad
186a5('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po mye dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
186a6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs por byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
186a7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
186a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par
186b1('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
186b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
186b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs
186b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chu la gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnas
186b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
186b6('bum): pong nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par
186b7('bum): byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs
186b8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sos/
187a1('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs/
187a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su
187a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs
187a4('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying / rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
187a5('bum): brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
187a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed
187a7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/
187a8('bum): dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos// rab 'byor de ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la
187b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas/
187b2('bum): pas/ chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / gang zang zing gtong ba dang / chos gtong ba yid la myi byed de/ de yan lag dang nyid
187b3('bum): lag kyang yongs su gtong na dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang 'di ltar bdag ni/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o// dngos po 'di btong ba'o// 'di la btang bar bya'o//
187b4('bum): snyam du myi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de/ gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos
187b5('bum): po myed pa la dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing yid la bya ba myed pa ni/ gtong ba rje sa su dran pa'o// rab 'byor da de ltar byang chub sems dpal
187b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems
187b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthard kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
187b8('bum): po de mkhan kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthard kyis bslab pa dang / mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
188a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdul kyi khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su
188a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha
188a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
188a4('bum): gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzo gas par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
188a5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yo ngas su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
188a6('bum): kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
188a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha
188a8('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
188b1('bum): kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
188b2('bum): kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
188b3('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
188b4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
188b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzha ga pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po mye da pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams
188b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su
188b7('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs
188b8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
189a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos pob myed po'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa
189a2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par
189a3('bum): tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
189a4('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
189a5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs
189a6('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs
189a7('bum): par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa ba'i yongs su rdzogs
189a8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
189b1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
189b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
189b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// / de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur
189b4('bum): de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos pa myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul ma yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba
189b5('bum): ci zhig smos rab 'byor da ji ltar na/ byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom payin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
189b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos
189b7('bum): thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du/ rtogs par byas nas/ lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa'i dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtsha
189b8('bum): ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa na spyod
190a1('bum): pa'i phyir myi 'ong ba de dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid myed de gang la ngo bo nyid myed pa de dag ni
190a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'o// dngos po myed pas ni dngos po myed pa la dran par myi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa myed cing / yid la bya ba myed pa ni lha rjes su dran pa'o// rab la
190a3('bum): 'byord de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/
190a4('bum): rab 'byor da de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthard kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis pa slob pa yod pa yin/ mthar da kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod
190a5('bum): pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthard kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthard kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas
190a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gi chu khris kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
190a7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
190a8('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
190b1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
190b2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
190b3('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa
190b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
190b5('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa ste/ nga pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
190b6('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
190b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
190b8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong
191a1('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i/
191a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang
191a3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po nas
191a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag
191a5('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad paM yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i
191a6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
191a7('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
191a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thard pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs
191b1('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs/
191b2('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
191b3('bum): par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzinang rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
191b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gsheg sa pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs
191b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzog sa par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
191b6('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
191b7('bum): 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis las rkyen
191b8('bum): bshes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i
192a1('bum): po nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po myed par 'du shes pa yang myed na/ dran pa'i las rdul cis yod pa 'am/
192a2('bum): dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta zhig spos// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
192a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
192a4('bum): yid la bya bas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind
192a5('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha
192a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
192a7('bum): phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos
192a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
192b1('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
192b2('bum): bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
192b3('bum): dngos po skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngom 'o//
192b4('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsla ba par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed
192b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po
192b6('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo 'i kyi tshul gyis dngos pa myed pa chos nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos
192b7('bum): po myed pa'i'aja ba nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
192b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la 'aslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams/
193a1('bum): sa bsab par byed/ dngam po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams sa bslab par bya'o/ dam pa byed pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi mar las rnams la bslag par bya'o//
193a2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i phob nyid kyi
193a3('bum): xxx
193a4('bum): xxx
193a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab bar bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis song ba nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bas pa par bya'o// dngos po kyi
193a6('bum): pamango bo nyid kyi rgyal gyis mtshar ma byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sonang pa'i ting nge 'dzind la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
193a7('bum): kyi rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa rnam pa la bslab par bya'o// dam po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rgyal gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsas par bya'o// dngam po myed pa'i chab nyid kyi rgyal kyis gzungs kyi/
193a8('bum): rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po bslab par bya'o/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis myi 'jigs pa pa'i sna bslab par/
193b1('bum): bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo
193b2('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
193b3('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
193b4('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la bslob pa'i mthar kyis spyad pa
193b5('bum): yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ thard kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa dang
