274b5('bum): par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smos
274b6('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs
274b7('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sobs
274b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden/
275a1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
275a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par thard pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad bI
275a3('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa 'gyur//
275a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// so so
275a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs
275a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u drug bcu gcig go//
275a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dkyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
275b1('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das des chos thams cad dbye sa mchis / mtshan ma sa mchis la rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gas na/ ji snyam pha rol tu phyin pa d+hag
275b2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
275b3('bum): phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang ji ltar na/ tha dad du gyur par
275b4('bum): gda' ba lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'dus pa lags ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par tshul khrims kyi
275b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par bzod pa'i pha rol tu nad pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha ro/
275b6('bum): tu phyind par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind par bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes
275b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dus pa lags// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab
275b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind par phyi stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par stong
276a1('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par chen po stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par don dam pa stong
276a2('bum): pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind par 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus pa
276a3('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus
276a4('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind parador ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rang bzhin stong pa nyid
276a5('bum): 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin / par chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rang gi mtshan
276a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dngos po skyed pa
276a7('bum): stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
276a8('bum): pa nyid 'dus pa lags// ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par yang dag par song
276b1('bum): ba rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par dbang po rnams 'dus pa lags
276b2('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
276b3('bum): rol tu phyind par 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi
276b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind par bsam gtan rnams 'dus pa lag/ sa/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par tshad myed pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha
276b5('bum): rol tu phyind par gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha lad tu phyind par rnam par thard pa rnams 'dus pa
276b6('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rnam par thard pa'i
276b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi
276b8('bum): pha ro long tu phyind par ting nge 'dzind rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par
277a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji skar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par myi 'jigs pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
277a2('bum): par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang par byams pa chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par snang
277a3('bum): chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags// bcom ldan 'das re ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la 'di sa
277a4('bum): stel/ mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcigapar gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyurade skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan
277a5('bum): ba rab 'byor dra la 'di skad ces bka' stsalar to// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
277a6('bum): rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa'i bsgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ ting nge 'dzin sbom mo
277a7('bum): shes rab smos so// s+thA ma lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa bsgom mo// brtson 'grus com mo/ ti/
277a8('bum): nge 'dzin sbom mo/ shes rab bsgom mo// smig rgyal bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sbom mo
277b1('bum): brtson 'grus tsam mo / ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ shes rab som mo// na thus bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // rgyal khrims srung ngo // bzod
277b2('bum): pa bsgom mo/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ shes rab sbom mo// myig yor lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // chu
277b3('bum): khrims srung ngo / bzod pa sbom mo/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sbom mo/ shes rab sgom mo// smra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su
277b4('bum): gtong ngo po// tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sdom mo/ rtson 'grus rtsom mo/ ting nge 'dzin sbom mo// shes rab snyom so// gzugs brnyam lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i
277b5('bum): phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / tshul khrims spang ngo // bzod pa sbom mo// brtson 'grus nom mo// ting nge 'dzin smom mo// shes rab sbom mo//
277b6('bum): dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lU la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sbom mo/ brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzind snyom mo
277b7('bum): shes rab sbom mo// sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sbom mo/ brtson 'grus rngom mo/ ting
277b8('bum): 'dzin sbom mo/ shes rab sgom mo// de 'di ltar rtog ste nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni rmyil ma lta bu ste mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid
278a1('bum): myed pa'o// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni spyog rgyul sde/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni chuzas bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar len/
278a2('bum): pa'i phung po lnga ni myig yor lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni/ sgra brnyan lta bu ste mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni/ gzugs brnyan
278a3('bum): lta bu ste mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga ni dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid myed pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sprulang pa lta bu ste mtshan nyid myed pa'o//
278a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rmyi lam la rang bzhin gang yang myed do// sgyu ma la rang bzhin gang yang myed do// smig rgyu la rang ba'i na gang yang myed do// chul zla la rang bzhin gang yang
278a5('bum): myed do// myig yor la rang bzhin gang yang myed do// sgra/ brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang myed do// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin gang yang myed do// dri za'i grong khyer la rang
278a6('bum): bzhin gang yang myed do// sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang myed do// gang la rang bzhin myed pa de la mtshan nyid myed de/ gang la mtshan nyid myed pa de ni 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan
278a7('bum): nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rdzogs par byed de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des nas khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ smin pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o// gtong ba ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o//
278a8('bum): lend pa ni mtshan nyid myed pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/ gang de ltar shes nas sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de sbyin gyi
278b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go/ brtson 'grus kyi
278b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir gyi ldog go// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las phyir myi ldog go// de pha rol tu phyin pa
278b3('bum): drug po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su
278b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yod / sa su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi ngas su rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
278b5('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dbang po lnga yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs pa/ ra byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su
278b6('bum): rdzogs byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
278b7('bum): byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// don dam pa stong pa
278b8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
279a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong
279a2('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
279a3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smos
279a4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin da yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma myed pa 'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// smon
279a5('bum): pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs
279a6('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
279a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/
279a8('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de 'phags
279b1('bum): pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag/
279b2('bum): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos stond pa de dag kyi drung du rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing / na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims
279b3('bum): cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen smand dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de long spyod dang spyod pa thams cad kyis kyang / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs
279b4('bum): su bsdu ba de dag kyang / sbyin pas yongs su sdud do// nga tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / tshul khrims kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bzod pas yongs
279b5('bum): su bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yongs su sdud do// gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ba rtson 'grus kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ting nge 'dzin
279b6('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su srung ngo // gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang shes rab kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs
279b7('bum): sru bsu pa de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su spyad do// gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su 'asdu ba de dag kyang gyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang byi nang stong pa nyid kyis
279b8('bum): yongs su bsdu pa de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//
280a1('bum): gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam/
280a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsrud do// gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud ngo // gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
280a3('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su spyad do// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis 'o
280a4('bum): su sdud do// gang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid/ kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang thog ma dang tha ma byed pa/ stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsrud do// gang dor ba myed
280a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dor ba rgya rapa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdud do// gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sru ba de dag kyang rang bzhin
280a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdud ro// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
280a7('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
280a8('bum): yongs su sdud do// gang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu
280b1('bum): ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // gang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do//
280b2('bum): gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang yang
280b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdud do// gang dbang po rnams kyis
280b4('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dbang pa rnams kyis yangs su bsdu ba da dag kyang dbang ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud da/ gang stobs
280b5('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdud do// gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan
280b6('bum): lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang lam gyis yod sa su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su slu ba de
280b7('bum): dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang tshad myed pa rnas
280b8('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
281a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mtha rad kyis gnas/
281a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
281a3('bum): byed pa dang / smond pa myed pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su srung ngo // gang mngon par
281a4('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mngon bar shes pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ting 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge
281a5('bum): 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ gang gzungs kyi/ sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzungs kyi sngon gyis yongs su sdud do// gang de bzhin gshegs
281a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang myi 'jigs
281a7('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang byams pa chen
281a8('bum): pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos
281b1('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su srud ngo // gang rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rgyu nang tu zhugs
281b2('bum): bu'i 'bras bus yongs su srung ngo // gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud // gang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus
281b3('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su srungad // gang dag bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid rgyas yongs su srung ngo // gang rang
281b4('bum): sa kyis yongs su bsdu pa de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis song sa su srung ngo// gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis sa su bsdu ba de dag kyang las kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis
281b5('bum): yongs su bsrung ngo // gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend panyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid kyis yongs su srung ngo // de ltar gang dang
281b6('bum): gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu pa de dag kyang dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas
281b7('bum): mkhom pa nye mar len kyang 'khor ba'i sgrag pasal gas kyi gos te/ de sems can rnams kyi don tu mi dang lce'i bran sum tshogs pa nye bar yin te/ phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems
281b8('bum): can rnams yongs su srung ngo // de chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par shes pas rgyu dang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la myi gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang
282a1('bum): de la myi gnas so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la myi gnas so// dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la myi gnas so// rang byang chub shes kyang de la myi gnas so//
282a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyird te//
282a3('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par shes pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// tshul khrims kyis
282a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par
282a5('bum): shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// nang stong pa nyid mtshan
282a6('bum): nyid myed par shes so// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed pa shes so// chen po stong pa nyid mtshan
282a7('bum): nyid med par shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so//
282a8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so//
282b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// mya dmyigs pa stong
282b2('bum): pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan
282b3('bum): nyid med par shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid myed
282b4('bum): par shes so// dbang po rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// stobs rnams mtshan ma myed par shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so//
282b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid myed pa rashes so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid
282b6('bum): myed par shes so// tshad myed pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rnam par tha rad pa rnams mtshan nyid
282b7('bum): myed par shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
282b8('bum): byed pa mtshan nyid myed par shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan
283a1('bum): nyid myed par shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// so so yang dag par
283a2('bum): rig pa rnams mtshan nyid myed par shes so// byams pa chen po mtshan nyid myed par shes so// snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid myed par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan
283a3('bum): nyid myed par shes so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid myed par shes so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid
283a4('bum): myed par shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rang byang chub mtshan nyid myed par shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so//
283a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mtshan nyid myed par shes so// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
283a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smyig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas
283a7('bum): chu zla lte bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ myig sor lta bu'i nye bar len po'i phung po lnga la gnas/ swa brnyan lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan la
283a8('bum): bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / tshul khrims
283b1('bum): kyipha cholas tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar le nad pa'i phung po lnga/ rmyi lam snang bu shes/ nye bar lend pa/
283b2('bum): phung po lnga l+h+wam su bum shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sti ka mya smra bur shes/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po sA n+ya thA la bu shes ma mend pa'i phung po lnga rgyag/ soms bu shes
283b3('bum): na pa'i phung ba sa rnams pashesaskye bar 'did ky-i mapa na su na ra na
283b4('bum): pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa la bum shes nas/ tshul sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid myed pa ma zhig ma ras pa/ spyod byed pa rnyog pa byed pa nyams pa myed
283b5('bum): dbang du gyur da pa mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin turdzogs par 'phags par gyur pa zag pa myed pa lam kyi yongs su chud pa 'jig rten las 'das pa yongs su
283b6('bum): rdzogs par byed de/ de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i brdal dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang chos nyid kyi thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul/
283b7('bum): khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang / kyi spang ba'i tshul khrims srung ngo / de rgyal khrims de lta bu dang ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs me ni mtho ma rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/
283b8('bum): zam ze'i tshe zhing mtho ga'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o 'am/ rgyal phran nam 'khor los spur ba'i rgyal
284a1('bum): por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ sum bcu rtsa gsum 'am/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam/
284a2('bum): 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe'am/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
284a3('bum): bu 'am/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub 'am/ byang chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar/
284a4('bum): chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid myed pa ste/ 'di ltar da ngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid ka/ cig pas na/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos kyis mtshan
284a5('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos thob par myi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha da da pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par myi rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid
284a6('bum): myed pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thob par myi rung ngo // rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
284a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan nyid myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go/ byang chub ses
284a8('bum): dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug pa'i tshe/ myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga rab
284b1('bum): tu thob nas/ gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing
284b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smind par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzind to// de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor
284b3('bum): yang 'khor ba'i las rnam par smind pas gos par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba
284b4('bum): sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba yang myi dmyig sa te/ de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do// sems can dang sems can du btags pa yang myi dmyigs so//
284b5('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs/ pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ nad tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
284b6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can chad myed pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang gang tha ra myed pa yang
284b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par bya ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang yang ma gzigs nas/ des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas spruld pa sprul pa mdzad de/
284b8('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// rab 'byor de de ltar sprul pa des bskal pa gcig lon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
285a1('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par
285a2('bum): gyu rad pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ dngos po gang yang dmyigs su myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub seMs
285a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa yang myi dmyigs la sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
285a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs
285a5('bum): pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos thams cad khongs su chud par shes so// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
285a6('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i
285a7('bum): nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285a8('bum): chen po mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285b1('bum): chen po mtshod sa rgyas pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis gang zhen/ nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang / rol khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o// de mA nyams su len
285b2('bum): pa'i 'azod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i druchung ngu gal te sems can
285b3('bum): thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba 'am/ myi snyan par rjod cing maklas pa'i tshig brdung ba zer bar gyur da tam/ rdo dbyug dang / mtshon chas rdegs sam/ btab kyang de la
285b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod pa'i rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ sems bskyed pa 'gal tsam yang lajug pa dang ldan pa
285b5('bum): gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par myi byaphyir sems can de dag la gyis sems can 'di dag mongs pa'i rang kyim ma rang ba / 'di dag la bang/
285b6('bum): gis sdig to'i sems kyi bskyed kyi 'di ni bdag nyid kyi phung po dgrar gyu pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to// zhes de dag la lag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o// byams pa dang ldan
285b7('bum): snying rje bar gyur nas rnam pa de ltar rtog pa 'di ni nyams su lend pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang men sems can de dag kyang don dam par dmyigs su
285b8('bum): byed ma 'dag pa gshe ba 'am/ kyi snyan par rjod pa 'am/ ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/ ro dbyugs gos reg cing mtshan 'debs pas su dag yod de/ 'du byed thams cad /
286a1('bum): sgyu ma lta bu gsog gso ba rag las pa nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang shed can dang / shed bdag dang bral ba ste/
286a2('bum): rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/ bdag la gshe ba dang myi snyan par rjod pa dang / ma klas pa'i tshig parlang bar zer ba dang / rdo dbyugs gis rdeg cing mtshon
286a3('bum): 'debs pa lta bu zhig yod de/ bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ de ltar rnam par brtag par myi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod zhes
286a4('bum): bya ste/ de de ltar yongs su rtog cing bzod pa'i pha rol/ tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de bzod pa pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ myi skye ba'i
286a5('bum): chos la bzod pa 'thob bo// rab 'byor da kyis gso lad pa/ bcom ldan 'das myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de la spangs pa ni mi mchis
286a6('bum): ye shes ni ci mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba myed pa de ni myi skye ba'o// de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/
286a7('bum): shes pa des myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang / byang /
286a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i bzod pa de dag la bye brag du bgyi ba ci mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
286b1('bum): rab 'byor rgyurab tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin
286b2('bum): ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// phyir myi 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o//
286b3('bum): dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba ka yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang spang ba gang yin pa
286b4('bum): de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i bye brag yin
286b5('bum): ro// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon te/ de rnam
286b6('bum): par sbyin pa las byung ba'i myi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzog
286b7('bum): pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams dang myi 'bral ba yin de/ mngon par shes pa de lnga dang myal
286b8('bum): 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa rnams dang myi 'bral bas sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/ de sems can rnams
287a1('bum): yongs su smyind par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed de/
287a2('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid myed pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
287a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi la ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ swA brnyan lta bu dang
287a4('bum): myig sor lta bu dang / sbru ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyal zu sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga sa gnas shing / lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo
287a5('bum): de lus kyi brtson 'grusa'i kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par smrab ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
287a6('bum): rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas
287a7('bum): nas/ theg pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid
287a8('bum): myed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa myed pa lam gyi yan lag du gyu ra pa lam gi khongs su chud pas brtson la
287b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dis ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
287b2('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa pa'i dang
287b3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / rgya
287b4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa bani dang / rnams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su 'dus pa song
287b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed de/ de la spyod cing byang chub sems da sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs
287b6('bum): bag chags kyi mamams spyong ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// bag chags kyi mtshams spor pa thams cad spangs nas mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// kun
287b7('bum): tu snang ba thob par byas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba bor bar 'gyur ro// de bsko pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa
287b8('bum): drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun nas gso ba dang / 'bul ba dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun nas 'phrul ba dang / theg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun nas lden
288a1('bum): par gyur na te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
288a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sku gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par gyurd pa'i sgra de stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de thams cad
288a3('bum): theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ brtson
288a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rnam pa
288a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par bya'o// rab byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
288a6('bum): rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po la
288a7('bum): la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
288a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmyi lam lta bu'i nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sra brnyan lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar lend
288b1('bum): pa'i phung po sA la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan du
288b2('bum): po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ 9 la la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan bani pa la nye bar bsgrubs
288b3('bum): gnas so// byams pa la sde bar sgrubs te gnas so/ bri rdzal nye bar bsgrubs te garas so// dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// btud snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas sa
288b4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye babasgrubs te gnas so// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched pa
288b5('bum): bar bslabs te gnas so// 'du shes myed 'du shes med sbyin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// stong pa nyid rang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i
288b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin som so/ srog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sbom mo yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
288b7('bum): ma gtogs par nyar thos dang thun mong ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong ba'i ting nge 'dzin kang ji srid pa dang gzhan yang ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang jiste
288b8('bum): pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin de dag dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar yang myi byed // de ci'i phyi/
289a1('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ting nge 'dzind de dag gi mtshan nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na mtshan
289a2('bum): nyid myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po myed pa'i chos kyang dngos po myed pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par ga la 'gyur te/ de ro myong bar byed pa myed pas
289a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang gi dbang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang myi dmyigs
289a4('bum): gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang gang gis snyoms par 'judag pa de yang myi dmyigs so// de myi dmyigs pas mtshan nyid myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
289a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da'o// rab 'byor da kyis la
289a6('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
289a7('bum): rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ nang stong pa nyid la
289a8('bum): shinang tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la shind tu bslabs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / chen po stong
289b1('bum): pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la shi nad tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shi nad tu bslabs pa dang /
289b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la shi nad tu bslabs pa dang / rang
289b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la shinang tu bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shind tu bslabs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa
289b4('bum): nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la shi nang tu bslabs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sha nad tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
289b5('bum): stong pa nyid la shind tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyi/ da 'di dag la ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ land cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir myi
289b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya
289b7('bum): ba de yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su shin tu 'das nas
289b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par 'jug go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/ skyon ma mchis pa ni gang
290a1('bum): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga dmyigs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no// myi dmyigs pa thams cad
290a2('bum): ni skyon myed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dmyigs pa ni gang lags/ myi dmyigs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de gzugs
290a3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor da tshor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor du 'du shes ni byang chub
290a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor de 'du byed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rab 'byor de rnam par shes
290a5('bum): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyi gas pa'o// myig dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// rna ba dang
290a6('bum): sma ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// sna dang dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// lcel dang ro ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
290a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// lus dang reg bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs pa'o// yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dmyigs
290a8('bum): pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes
290b1('bum): pa ni dmyigs pa'o// ma pa'i 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// sA 'i rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o// sna'i 'dus te re/
290b2('bum): pa ni dmyigs pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni dmyigs pa'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmyigs pa'o// lce'i 'dus
290b3('bum): reg pa'i rmyi rang kyis tshor ba ni dmyigs pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmyigs pa'o// lum kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyigs pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
290b4('bum): tshor pa ni dmyigs pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pami dmyigs pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni dmyig / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni
290b5('bum): sa'o// sa'i khams ni sdigs da / rgya'i 'ams ni dmyigs 'i khams / sa pa'o// ram
290b6('bum): khams ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni dmyigs pang // rig pa ni dmyigs pa'o// 'du byed ni dmyigs pa'o/ rnam par thas pa ni dmigs pa'o//

290b8('bum): pa ni dbyigs pa'o// lte ba ni rgyags / ni dmyigs pang // smon pa'i pha rol ba tu phyinang pa ni dmyigs pa/ tshul rnams med tu byin pa ni dmyigs pa/
291a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// shes rag
291a2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs
291a3('bum): pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// mtha'
291a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dor ba skye da pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa
291a5('bum): nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nga/ myigs pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyig/ sa pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o//
291a6('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni
291a7('bum): dmyigs pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// dbang po rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// stobs rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// byang
291a8('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dmyigs pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni dmyigs pa'o//
291b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni dmyigs pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par la
291b2('bum): 'jug pa dgu ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa' ni dmyigs pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// ting nge
291b3('bum): 'dzind rnams ni dmyigs pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dmyigs pa'o// myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dmyigs pa'o// so so yang dag
291b4('bum): par rig pa bzhini dmyigs pa'o// byams pa chen po'i ni dmyigs pa'o// snying rje chen po ni dmyigs pa'o// nga sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni dmyigs pa'o//
291b5('bum): rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// lan ga phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// phyir myi'o// dra ba'i 'bras bu ni dmyigs pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni
291b6('bum): dmyigs pa'o// rang byang chub ni dmyigs pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni dmyigs pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni dmyigs pa ste/ skyon no// rab 'byor nga skyon myed pa ni
291b7('bum): gang la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang // myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang // gzugs dang / sma dang /
291b8('bum): ro dang / reg dang / chos dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
292a1('bum): da kyi rnam bu shes pa dang / d+h+r-ig gi 'dus te ga pa dang / na ba'i lus te ku pa dang / 'as te reg pa dang kyi 'dus te/
292a2('bum): pa dang // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
292a3('bum): kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dang // sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung
292a4('bum): ki khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang // ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / myong dang gzugs pa dang
292a5('bum): skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / le nad pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
292a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
292a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / dor dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang
292a8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
292b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo'o//
292b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
292b3('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad myed pa rnams dang / gzugs
292b4('bum): skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam paratha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyomarnam par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo
292b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi smornams dang / de bzhin
292b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcur dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
292b7('bum): dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
292b8('bum): nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang chos de dag gi rjod pa yang dmyigs su myed pa'o/
293a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya babam po / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar gzugs la rang /
293a2('bum): bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// tshor ba la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// 'du shes la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la

293a6('bum): pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// lus la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// yid la rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o/
293a7('bum): gzugs la rang bzhin myed de/ gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// smal rang bzhin myed de gang la rang bzhin myed pa de ni brjod du myed pa'o// dri la rang bzhin myed de gang la
