330b3('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la sa sra zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos stonar to// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
330b4('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi/ phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung / ki bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
330b5('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos s+ho/ nad pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
330b6('bum): byed kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gis yongs su mya ngan
330b7('bum): las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor pa de la lha'i bu ka pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas che
330b8('bum): myos pa de dag la gzhal byed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag smyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad
331a1('bum): ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par
331a2('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos stonang to// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
331a3('bum): na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos stond pa dang / sum cu rtsa
331a4('bum): gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dgadang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
331a5('bum): dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa/ gsum pos rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rgyu/ rang pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs
331a6('bum): su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar byas shing / de dag spyo bar
331a7('bum): gyu rang par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni myi
331a8('bum): brtam pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la la su zhig yi phebs par gnas shes chos son
331b1('bum): rang 'byor ngas yang 'drinas spangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ gleng gi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
331b2('bum): chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos sond pa dang / sum curtsa gsum dang / mche ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rnams la chos stond pa dang /
331b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos ras/ theg pa gsum mos rim gis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / los bya na ma ya sa sos rgya
331b4('bum): ga ya 'gyur 'ayong ste/ rab 'byor da de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa/ 'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal myed khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag smyo bar gyur
331b5('bum): par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad ni myi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal pa/ 'du byed thams cad mi bdag myed pa/ 'du byed thams cad
331b6('bum): mi myi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du myi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston
331b7('bum): to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
331b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog/
332a1('bum): dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po
332a2('bum): la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos stonang to// rab 'byor da de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di
332a3('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can
332a4('bum): kang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye gro gas po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta
332a5('bum): spyod ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams
332a6('bum): la chos stond to// rab 'byor da de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor da ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
332a7('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs po'i lha
332a8('bum): pa la mngon par zhend pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag
332b1('bum): dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor da de ni ngo mtshar che
332b2('bum): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chang du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi
332b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang kwa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos
332b4('bum): thams cad stong pa la ci ga lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gso ga dang gso bshasags ci rtogs pasnyed ces sa ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/
332b5('bum): 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mas song/ chen po la gnas zhing / sems can rnamasal chos sonang ngo // rab 'byor da de na ngo mtshar che ste/

339a1('bum): pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi ston pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor nga de ltar ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams
339a2('bum): 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no//
339a3('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi smyon pa byis so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di la ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di
339a4('bum): dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
339a5('bum): pa dang // rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam parathard pa brgyad dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms para'ajug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
339a6('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
339a7('bum): gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de la dran pa
339a8('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nang gi lus dang phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags
339b1('bum): sems dang srin gyi bde garnam pa gas cingarnam par spyod / sram la kun 'byung ba'i rjes sas ning rnam par spyodado// lus pa zad pa'i rjes sul 'ang rnam par spyod do/ yus la kur 'gyung
339b2('bum): dang bang ba'i/ sa su la zhing rnam par spyod do// sum la myo gnas pa rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten drug yang nye bar yi nad pa skyed do// nang gi tshor ba dang phyi'i tshor ba dang phyi nang ga tshor ba la tshor ba'i
339b3('bum): rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par rtsa lad cing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba'i rjes sus/
339b4('bum): zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing na ma par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lnga zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la myi gnas par rnam par
339b5('bum): spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed do// nang gi sems dang phyi'o sems dang phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan
339b6('bum): ba dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par gsald cing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la zad pa'i
339b7('bum): rjes su la zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar lend pa myed do//
339b8('bum): rang gi chos dang phyi'i chos dang phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam
340a1('bum): par spong ngo // chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang 'dra pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod/
340a2('bum): // chos la myi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar le nad pa myed do// rab 'byor de yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhen/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi
340a3('bum): bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa sbed cing brtson 'grub rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing
340a4('bum): da tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyod pa'o// rab 'byor du/ 'phrul gi rkang pa pa'i gang zhen/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin
340a5('bum): spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzind spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rgyu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong
340a6('bum): pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzind spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus
340a7('bum): kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson la
340a8('bum): 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran
340b1('bum): bsang dag byang chub kyi sa na lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang bdag byang chub kyi san lag dang / brtson 'grus rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dka' ba yang dag byang chub
340b2('bum): yan lag dang / shin tu byang la yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi ma
340b3('bum): gra btsun zhes bya'o// rab 'byon 'phags pa'i sem sa lag brgyad pa gang byen/ 'dis ma sang dag pa'i sa pa dang / yang dag pa'i cog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngan dang / 5
340b4('bum): ba'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags
340b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting 'dzind gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa
340b6('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o//
340b7('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// smon pa myed
340b8('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzind gang zhe na/ myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni spond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// rnam par thard pa brgyad gang zhe na
341a1('bum): gzugs can gyis gzugs rnam par mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di mi rnam par thar pa/
341a2('bum): gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas
341a3('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa lnga pa'o// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa drug pa'o// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye
341a4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar/ pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar/ bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa ste/
341a5('bum): de dag ni rnam par thard pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben
341a6('bum): ba rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar
341a7('bum): zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyu rad pas rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa 'a dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs/
341a8('bum): te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan
341b1('bum): pa 'de bas rnam par spong sa patang snyoms pa'o nas brjod pa de/ dga' ba myed pa'i bamam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas sa de 'de ba yang sangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang
341b2('bum): yid kyi 'de bsnanas kyang chub pas med pa yang byed sdug bsngal sa myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad su
341b3('bum): gzugs kyi 'a shes pa sa ngan par 'as// tshogs pa'i 'chushes rnams nub par gyur cing snga tshogs kyi bcugs yid la myi byed pas rnam sa' mtha'asam so zhes tenam ma' lamathal lam skye med
341b4('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dernam pa thams cadanas mkha' mtha' las skye mched sus yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las so zhes rnam shes mtha' sas rtse
341b5('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'ang/ sa te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la
341b6('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bslabs te gnas so// de rnam pa thos
341b7('bum): cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug paradagu
341b8('bum): zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhen/ mtha' dgas dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag mye dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang /
342a1('bum): mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zi lad kyis gnon/
342a2('bum): ba'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol kyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mtho' yang gzugs de dag zild kyis mnan te shes zi lad kyis
342a3('bum): mnand te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnod pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha do/ dang kha dog myi sdug pa ma
342a4('bum): yang gzugs de dag zi yid kyis mnand te shes/ zild sa mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zimed kyis nond pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// rang gzugs myed par
342a5('bum): 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog myi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de gzil kyis mnand te shes zil kyis gnan te mthong
342a6('bum): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil kyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa
342a7('bum): mthong yang gzugs de dag zil kyis mnan te shes zil kyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni ziled kyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing
342a8('bum): phyi rol kyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon por snang ba mdog sngon po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me tog o ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul ba ran ser byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba kha dog sngo bsngo bar snang
342b1('bum): mdog sngo bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zo la kyis mnar te shes 'i lad kyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil dkyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga'o// nang gzugs myed par 'a
342b2('bum): shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser por snang ba mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul ba ran ser byas pa'i gos sbyar sem pa kha dog mo
342b3('bum): bser bar snang ba mdog ser bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zi la kyis mnan te shes zis dkyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil kyis gnonod pa'i snye mnar drug pa'o// na
342b4('bum): gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dam ra po kha dog dmar po dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ man tu 'jib ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/
342b5('bum): yul ba ran ser byas pa'i gos ltar dmar pa kha dog dmarab dmar bar snang ba mdog dmar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zild kyis mnan te shes zil dkyis mnan te mthong
342b6('bum): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnond pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs myed par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba mdog dkar po 'di
342b7('bum): ste/ dper na/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od zla 'am/ yul ba ran ser byas pa'i gos sum dka sa/ kha dog dkar pa dkar bar snang ba mdog dkar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag
342b8('bum): bi lid kyis mnand te shes mi lid kyis mnand te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zi lid kyis gnond pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa myed pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la
343a1('bum): gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rold kyi nyon mongs pa myi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis/
343a2('bum): 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya'o// smond lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di zhes par bya'o// zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi
343a3('bum): shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smond pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzind de las langs nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de yang shes
343a4('bum): pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i myig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i
343a5('bum): rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa 'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad pa shes
343a6('bum): pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de ma yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ sus yongs su dag pa dang / dmyigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su
343a7('bum): dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ che la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang
343a8('bum): ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go//
343b1('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la
343b2('bum): yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smind pa gnas kyi rnam pa
343b3('bum): dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can
343b4('bum): gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyend do// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang /
343b5('bum): tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mnang to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba shin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang stobs dang
343b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa
343b7('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa ru mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya'o/
343b8('bum): dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma
344a1('bum): dang / bskalar pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug la
344a2('bum): 'dug go// mying ni 'di zhes bya bar gyurd to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyurd to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur da to// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni
344a3('bum): 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du/ rnam pa dang bcas sa mal dang bcas gtan
344a4('bum): tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba skye ba dag kyang gzigs so//
344a5('bum): kha dog sdug pa dang myi sdug pa dang bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams rab tu
344a6('bum): mkhyend te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la spu rad pa 'debs pa log par
344a7('bum): ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lum zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems cad 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par
344a8('bum): spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa' la spu rang pa myi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyend kyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
344b1('bum): 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyend do// zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa myed pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
344b2('bum): mkhyend te bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes
344b3('bum): dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste
344b4('bum): 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba/ 'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag pa/ ra rjes su ma mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang
344b5('bum): bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra basmag go// tshangs
344b6('bum): pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lnga 'am bdud mams pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//
344b7('bum): bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur na to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ smye dgu
344b8('bum): tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob
345a1('bum): pa dang / bag chab myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jig dar thob par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo
345a2('bum): pa'ajig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud ngam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis
345a3('bum): bar chad kyi chos su bstand pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten
345a4('bum): na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang ya nga dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba
345a5('bum): myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod/ de khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i smra ba smag go/ tshangs pa'i
345a6('bum): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong 'am/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa ra bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//
345a7('bum): kar yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par
345a8('bum): zad par 'gyur bar gyi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar
345b1('bum): 'gyur ro nas bya ba'i lus pas bdag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ thus dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag 'de ba thob pa dang bag cha ba myed pa thob pa dang / kyi 'jigs pa thob par/
345b2('bum): rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i spa basmag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong 'am bram ze 'am lA 'am/ bdud dam tshangs
345b3('bum): pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste/ bzhi po de dag ni myi 'jigs pa'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag
345b4('bum): par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dis te/ don po sa yang dag/ par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs
345b5('bum): pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmyigs pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa dang / nges ba'i tshig la dmyigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmyigs pa'o//
345b6('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba myed pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag
345b7('bum): pa myi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba myed pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs
345b8('bum): su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa myi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/
346a1('bum): 'di ni srung ba myed pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa kyi
346a2('bum): mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la myi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba myed pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa
346a3('bum): nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos stond pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i
346a4('bum): chos la nan tan du byed na/ yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par myi 'gyur/ yid bde bar myi 'gyur/ thugs yed seng por myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhas
346a5('bum): pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa myed pa dang / chos da nga gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du myi byed na yang / des de
346a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar myi bzod par myi 'gyur thugs myi ches par myi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyand pa'i
346a7('bum): sems nye bar gzhogs chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la ras mes/ sa lan pa brgyad de sa gror kyi nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa skyed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos pa
346a8('bum): nan tan du myi byed kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa 'am/ thugs khro ba gnyis su myi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyend par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgong sa/
346b1('bum): ba nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyams pa myed pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems
346b2('bum): can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las kyi mda' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa skyed pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhen/ 1
346b3('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang myi mngal ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs
346b4('bum): pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pa gang zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po sa/ dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brdal nye bar bzung ste/
346b5('bum): dge ba'i sa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyid lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa yadza da ces bya ste/ dngos su ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
346b6('bum): kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su sbyind par bya ba la gzigs partag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
346b7('bum): chosas 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa myi mnga'o// tsaco myi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa gyi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs kyi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma
346b8('bum): bzhag pa gyi mapa'o/ ma btags pa'i btang snyoms kyi yang ro// mos pa yongs su nyams bgyi ya / brtson 'grus yongs su nyams la gyi yang che/ dgom pa songs su nyams bgyi sa //
347a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa myi mang 'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa myi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i yongs su nyams pa gyi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa
347a2('bum): yongs su nyams pa gyi mnga'o// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye ge ci rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes
347a3('bum): su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ seg+sa kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags pa thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'dug go/
347a4('bum): ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzig sa pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa ste/ de dag
347a5('bum): ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'a/ byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmyigs pa myed pa dran pas
347a6('bum): dbang bsgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid myong ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ces bya'o// / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myi chen po'i mtshan sum
347a7('bum): bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabras 'khol ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang
347a8('bum): 'dun shin rgyal po pa dang / sor mo ring ba dang / ting pa yangs pa dang / sku me zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par 'tho bdang yan lag gi sku rkyen du 'byil pa dang /
347b1('bum): ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / bsad pa'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shind tu 'jam pa dang / s+phu re re nas g.yas
347b2('bum): phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgya nad pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shinan tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya kro
347b3('bum): ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shi nad tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shi nad tu dkar ba dang / tshems shi nad tu
347b4('bum): mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag
347b5('bum): dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad so ngas su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am pa so la gzug
347b6('bum): brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa myed pas 'bas shin tu gnas pa
347b7('bum): ngang ba'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas phyag dang 'bas dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi ye myag shind tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dnga'abs gnor 'di 'jam pa'o//
347b8('bum): phyag dang 'bas mgu ra kyi lhun shin tu mtho bas mdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo rang ba'o// ting pa ring bas ting pa yangs pa'o// sku lag pa mdun du
348a1('bum): 'phagasas drang bas sku me zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i ljang dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho pa'o// su gye na tu gams phyogs su 'khyil pas/ yan laH
348a2('bum): gi spu kye nang tu 'khyi mad pa'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang ldum bu dang pa ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dgas e ne ya'i byi nad pa
348a3('bum): lta bu'o// brla drang por bzhag ste/ ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis me'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brgya drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang / rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shi nad tu
348a4('bum): mdzes par sbubs su nub pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser ki kha dog la bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go// gser dang dngul
348a5('bum): shind tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog tu 'du ga la sku la rdul myi 'gos pas mdog shi nad tu 'jam pa'o// shi nad tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis su myed
348a6('bum): pas/ sku re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o// me tog kun da dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i
348a7('bum): mdzod sus sngon mtshams ga ring tu brgyadad pas lam mdzod// mo so sems seng ge'i gad do// mgur dang chud legs par 'brel cing lun zlus pas zag pa'i yun mdzes par
348a8('bum): grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so gni tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams shing rnam par shes
348b1('bum): pa 'dra myed pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sUr+ya zheng 'dom du mnyam pas shing n+ya kro da ltar chu zheng kab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing
348b2('bum): legs par grub la mdzes pa mngal bas dbu sti gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog sung pa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog kar 'dug cing / shind tu sangs pas lags gi nad tu yangs shing sra
348b3('bum): pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka b+hing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i
348b4('bum): 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shi nad tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas/ tshems shi nad tu dkar ba'o// tshoms la mthon dman myed pas
348b5('bum): tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og tu gye gu myed pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar nag
348b6('bum): gi cha ma 'dres la shi nad tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos pa g.yogs pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shind tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o/
348b7('bum): de la bla ma'i bsu basprul dang chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / rtsug laka khang dang / mchod rten rjes su bsgrub pa la sogs pa la phu dud byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang
348b8('bum): ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shi na tu gnas pa ste/ de ni myi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga lus so// sbyin pa dang ngag snya
349a1('bum): pa dang / don spyod pa dang / dor mthun pa'i bsdu pa rnam pa'i goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du 'dra ba'i snga lus so// bza' ba dang bca'/
349a2('bum): ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun sha nad tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su
349a3('bum): badre ba 'thob pa'i snga lngas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas sor mo 'ong ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / spu che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni
349a4('bum): sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag pa/ ra blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spelar cing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag
349a5('bum): gi spu gyen tu 'khyil pa ste/ de ni myi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo' las rim gror bya sa shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas
349a6('bum): ri dgas me me sa'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzind pa'i sA ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na myi 'gong par gtong zhing byed ces ma byas pas/ phyag bcu drang por
349a7('bum): slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang / dul ba'i snga las so// 'grogs pa dang mjal bshes dang gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa
349a8('bum): yang dag par 'askul pa dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas srubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang gos dang khang pa dang / gnam
349b1('bum): rtsed 'ang dang gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi 'dog dang dang / mdog shininang tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gangan ngan ba'a' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / gnas pazang po 'jos pa
349b2('bum): sngasmras so// 'du 'dzisangs pas mkhan po dang slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / mu mu las sogs pa tha ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim mo byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang /
349b3('bum): lam gnar bas/ spyi re menas gas pa phyogs su lakhyil ba dang / sa mdzod sum brgyan pas/ de na mnyas bskyed pa'i sngasmras so// kyi spar par myi zer zhi gyi sad la
349b4('bum): sma zhing legs par bshad pa 'thum par 'dzind pas se / ro songs bu dang / zag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa / de ni thub pa myed pa'i snga lngas so// na pa rnams la
349b5('bum): dang rim gro dang sman pa dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin/ ba dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shinang tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nad nyung ba'i snga ltas so/
349b6('bum): bskyed mos tshal dang 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang gtsug lag khang bya ba la stsogs pa la gzhan mos
349b7('bum): par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng kab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan
349b8('bum): cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas lpags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan
350a1('bum): lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing myi 'thun pa myed pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / btang /
350a2('bum): kyi za zhing nar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig kyal ba spangs shing / rus su smra ba spa bas seng ge'i 'gram pa la bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i sna
350a3('bum): ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa myed pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ tshems shind tu dkar ba dang / mnyam pa ste de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring
350a4('bum): po nas bde nas bden zhing phra ma myed pa'i tshig smra ba smra bas// tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi pa/ cu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer myi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/
350a5('bum): pang gis khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa myed la ma cha gas myi sdang ba dang rmongs pa myed pa'i myig gis lta lta bas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni
350a6('bum): kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
350a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams
350a8('bum): pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i thugs mnga' ste/ sen mo'i mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo
350b1('bum): mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshul la kha na ma thob myi mnga' ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shi nad tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas
350b2('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang
350b3('bum): sku'i phrin las dang 'tsho ba shind tu dben pa ste/ rtsa myi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi mnyam pa thams cad las stsol pa ste/ zhabs myi mnyam pa myed pa yin
350b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi'i seng ge ste seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myo'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su
350b5('bum): bzhudan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga pa'i rgyal por ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ dang pa/ li skabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgya nga 'das rdzas
350b6('bum): ni myol khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi skabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas
350b7('bum): na 'das rnams na pas na mdzes pa/ mdzem par 'tha pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nirtag tu thags son pa kyim / su so par brgyud pa yid/ sus
350b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan stond pa ste/ su shi ni tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shand tu sbyangs pa ste/ sru
351a1('bum): shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis sond pa ste/ smra rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spu dang gsung dang
351a2('bum): thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shind tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shi nad tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
351a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste
351a4('bum): dpe byad sha nang tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba stond pa ste/ sgra che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
351a5('bum): rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mang pa ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas brtsam ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa
351a6('bum): ste/ sku shi nad tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa myed pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum pa myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni myi dge
351a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shind tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ spu shi ning tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas la
351a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'bral par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / nying lag legs par stond pa ste/ yan laka dang nying lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
351b1('bum): snang bu ga 'i myed kyi ma dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas sa ldan 'das rnams ni rgyas dang na rnams #
351b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhor ba'i shes pa thams cad shin tu mam pa / byas byam mer 'jug pa min/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyal kyi na
351b3('bum): na/ ngasargyas cob ldan 'das rnams rnamamapa yogan tu thugs sa chud pa ga labab pa yin/ sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'phrul
351b4('bum): 'an pa'i thob ma mngal ba/ ba gams s+ho/ sa su 'khyim pa sminaya mam com ldan 'das rnams ni bslab ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun ma
351b5('bum): bste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas brtsamaldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan 9/ kun spyod pa ga ning tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas
351b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstand pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la skye ba myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang ba rab tu
351b7('bum): 'thob pa'i chos stond pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shind tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/
351b8('bum): phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shi nad tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i
352a1('bum): chos yangs pa stond pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring po yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang myi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang myi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas
352a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba sa/
352a3('bum): sngags shi na tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shinang tu sgrub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ byis
352a4('bum): ba'i skye bo 'dod/ chag pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul bting / dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shind tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug
352a5('bum): gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa myi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyand cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde
352a6('bum): bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyand cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems
352a7('bum): mche ba shi nad tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang
352a8('bum): 'dul ba shind tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shi nad tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/
352b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos stond pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la
352b2('bum): bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shi nang tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
352b3('bum): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phum du sangs pa mang ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa zhin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ skyen rnam par dag pa yin
352b4('bum): sangs rgyas com ldan 'das rnams ni semam ca kyi chagasatu bsngags / ma thug sa / sangs rgyas ma ldan 'das rnams ni m+b+ha dang l+h+wam yin dang / skem tha
352b5('bum): na chung mchog myig dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma / ra 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab ma lar 'dug pa
352b6('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ sprin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba
352b7('bum): mkhas pa ste/ sprin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ston thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sbyid ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
352b8('bum): 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ sbyin ma snum pa dang ldan yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan
353a1('bum): pa mngal ba phre/ sman legs shing sman shal rib ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ne/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom/
353a2('bum): ldan 'das ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyand kyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/
353a3('bum): zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shind tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
353a4('bum): 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shi nad tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shi na tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par zlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba
353a5('bum): ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang ba'i bka la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas
353a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/
353a7('bum): dbu myi 'dzings pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu myi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag smospos
353a8('bum): kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyaka dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' ba 'khyil pas brgya rang pa
353b1('bum): yin te/ rab 'byor me dag mi de bzhin gshegs pa dam bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ris kyad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gan
353b2('bum): la bshad pa dang bstand pa dang / yang dag par bstand pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
353b3('bum): rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor da de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so//
353b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po / rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/
353b5('bum): chen po tshig snyand pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di
353b6('bum): sngar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
353b7('bum): tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyand par smra bas sems can rnams srung ngo //
354a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor nga de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
354a2('bum): po tshig snyand par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang
354a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i
354a4('bum): chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor nga de ltar na bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems
354a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sku da pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis
354a6('bum): don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rold tu phyind pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed de/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems
354a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams srung ngo // rab 'byor de de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos// rab 'byor gzhan
354a8('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad 'dems shing 'di skad ston to//
354b1('bum): kyibacad ga mngon par bsgru pas sa par gyi / gagacig la mas ra gnyis nam yi ke na brgyan gnyis kyi bar la mams par
354b2('bum): mig gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cadags par gyis shig/ yi ga gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ mi ge ba'i brgya gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang ba'i
354b3('bum): thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sbom shig ces ston to// rab 'byor dpyas
354b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig dmakhas pa yin/ mi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la ma' sa pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi brtsa
354b5('bum): gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa mkhas
354b6('bum): par bya ba la goms shing / yi ge myed pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos
354b7('bum): la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge myed pa'i chos stond kyang / rab 'byor da chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba
354b8('bum): yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor da de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no//
355a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
355a2('bum): stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shinang tu myi dmyigs/ chos kyang myi dmyigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang myi dmyigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
355a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
355a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyo ra pa dang // bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /
355a5('bum): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang // stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'oH/ nad dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / smond pa
355a6('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi
355a7('bum): dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / mya chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
355a8('bum): po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smyind pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos stond par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can myi dmyigs te/ sems can du gdags
355b1('bum): pasang kyi dmyigs so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas
355b2('bum): 'du shes dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
355b3('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ myig dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rna ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sna dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
355b4('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ lce dmyigs su ma mchis so// sa/ mas can myi dmyigs pas/ lus dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ yid dmyigs su ma
355b5('bum): mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pasasma dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas
355b6('bum): dri dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ ro dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ reg dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/
355b7('bum): sa dmyigs sa ma mtsham// sems can gyi dmyigs pa/ rtsig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs sum mchis so// sems can mi dmyigs pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su
355b8('bum): ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su sa ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ lce'i rnam par zhes pa dmyigs sum ma /
356a1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems/
356a2('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/
356a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so sems can gyi dmyigs las sde'i lus te reg pa kyis su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi
356a4('bum): dmyigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su ma ma chis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so//
356a5('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can mying / myigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba
356a6('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
356a7('bum): kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sa'i khams
356a8('bum): dbyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ chu'i khams dbyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ kye'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dbyis/
356b1('bum): 5/ rlung gi khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dmyigs
356b2('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ ma rig pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'du byed dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/
356b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mying dang gzugs dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ skye mched drug dmyigs su ma mchis so
356b4('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ reg pa dmyigs su ma mchi sa so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ tshor ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ med pa/
356b5('bum): dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas lend pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyig sa pas/ srid pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
356b6('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ skye ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rga shi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs
356b7('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchin
356b8('bum): so/ sems can myi dmyigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so//
357a1('bum): sems can myi dmyigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems cad gyi
357a2('bum): dmyigs pas phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su
357a3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs
357a4('bum): pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/
357a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ste/ nga pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs
357a6('bum): pas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ chos thams cad stong /

357a8('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
357a9('bum): can gyi dmyigs pas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchim so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems
357b1('bum): can myi dmyigs pas/ yang dag par spong ba dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs
357b2('bum): pas/ dbang po la dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas stobs lnga dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can gyi dmyigs pas byaca kyi ngas dmyigs su ma

357b5('bum): 'jug pa dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dbyin/ sa pas/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mthar kyis
357b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ stong pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ mtshan ma myed pa dmyigs

358a2('bum): pa bzhi dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ byams pa chen po dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ snying rje chen po dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems

358a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ myi chen po'i
358a7('bum): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can myi dmyigs pas/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmyigs su ma mchis so// sems can dmyigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can
